2020-07-06T01:30:41.000Z: It would have improved West Virginia's economy and the nation's energy supply. It's a shame to see this project cancelled. I will continue to do everything in my power to make sure that projects like this can move forward in the future to make our state even more prosperous.
2020-07-06T01:30:40.000Z: I am disappointed by the decision to shut down the Atlantic Coast pipeline project. I've always said West Virginia abounds in natural resources unlike anywhere else. This project would have meant countless dollars and thousands of jobs for our state.

2020-07-04T12:36:07.000Z: Happy 4th of July WV. In the time of covid-19, avoid the 3 C's - close contact with those you do not live with (stay 6 ft distanced), crowds, and closed indoor places.
